The chunk defines a list of collision mask combinations (`self.maskList`) and an index position (`self.maskPos`) to track the current active mask. This setup enables dynamic switching between different collision detection configurations during runtime.

# Make a list of different combinations of the masks for later use.
        # We will switch between these masks later on.
        self.maskList = [
            ["floor", floorMask],
            ["smiley", goodMask],
            ["frowney", badMask],
            ["characters", goodMask | badMask],
            ["smiley and floor", goodMask | floorMask],
            ["frowney and floor", badMask | floorMask],
            ["all", floorMask | goodMask | badMask]
        ]
        # This keeps track of where we are in the dictionary.
        self.maskPos = 0
